title: "Report on racism and intolerance in Estonia: improve anti-discrimination legislation and combat hate speech"
excerpt: "In a report published today, the European Commission against Racism and Intolerance (ECRI) calls on the Estonian authorities to ensure that general anti-discrimination legislation is accessible and effective and to tackle the problem of racist and LGBTI-phobic hate speech."
